Creating a BLASTDB

12 months ago

SATurn includes the tool "makeblastdb" to convert FASTA files into BLAST index files. To create a new BLAST DB or update an existing one follow the instructions below.

  1. Save your sequences into a FASTA file (DNA or Protein) (see FASTA file format)
  2. Open a terminal and navigate to the SATurn installation directory (see Opening a Terminal)
  3. Run the following command

    bin/deployed_bin/makeblastdb.exe' -in my_sequences.fasta -dbtype nuc

    dbtype: "nucl" for DNA and "prot" for Protein
